message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the rest. Hopefully, we can work something out for a better split later.
I think a 55/45 split is fair. We can both get a good amount, and there's still room to negotiate in future rounds.
I understand you want a bigger share, but I'm not willing to go below 60% for myself. Let's try to find a compromise closer to my offer.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you 40% if you agree to a 60/40 split.  We both get a solid chunk of the money, and it's a fairer deal than the previous offers.
